meanings.definition: Traveling from place to place, especially for work.
meanings.sent1: The itinerant salesman visited different towns to sell his products.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the itinerant lifestyle of moving to new cities for her job.
meanings.sent3: The itinerant chef kept hopping from one restaurant to another, leaving a trail of delicious dishes behind.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like an itinerant cloud, drifting from one idea to the next without settling.
meanings.sent5: The itinerant nature of the wind carried the scent of flowers from afar.

meanings.definition: A person who travels from place to place, especially for work.
meanings.sent1: The itinerant brought his tools with him wherever he went.
meanings.sent2: She met an itinerant artist who painted landscapes in different cities.
meanings.sent3: The itinerant juggler entertained crowds with his traveling show.
meanings.sent4: His heart was an itinerant wanderer, seeking new experiences in every town.
meanings.sent5: The itinerant's footsteps echoed through the empty streets as he moved on to the next destination.
